title: Rei Higuchi
text:
Rei Higuchi (<a href="Japanese%20language">Japanese</a>: 樋口黎; born 28 January 1996) is a Japanese freestyle wrestler who won a silver medal in the 57 kg division at the 2016 Olympics.
Higuchi studies at the <a href="Nippon%20Sport%20Science%20University">Nippon Sport Science University</a>. He fractured his right hand in October 2015, but won the All Japan Tournament in December that year.
On 28 January 2017 he competed at the <a href="Golden%20Grand%20Prix%20Ivan%20Yarygin%202017">Golden Grand Prix Ivan Yarygin 2017</a>, in the qualification he was eliminated by <a href="Gadzhimurad%20Rashidov">Gadzhimurad Rashidov</a> of <a href="Russia">Russia</a>, but he went on to wrestle back and win a bronze medal against Bulat Batoev of Russia.
